items.title: Republicans Muscle Trump's Sweeping Tax Cut, Spending Bill
items.description: Congressional Republicans pass controversial budget bill that dramatically slashes Medicaid and other social service programs. Reuters Health Informat...

items.title: Study: Rx Delayed in Half of US Children With Vitiligo
items.description: Only half of pediatric patients with vitiligo receive treatment within 2 years of diagnosis, a US study reports. Medscape Medical News

items.title: MHRA Approves New Immunotherapy for Bladder Cancer
items.description: The MHRA has approved a new immunotherapy for BCG-unresponsive bladder cancer, offering a bladder-sparing alternative to cystectomy. Medscape News UK
